Name: Arcana: Heat and Cold. Season 2
About the game: Season 2 is: -More pictures and a bit less text *Elves, humans, monster girls, imps. -Turn-based combat system The gameplay component is no longer a set of mini-games, but a full-fledged combat system. *Combat is not the core of the game, but it has its place in the narrative. *It’s not difficult , but will make you think a little. This is not a standard combat system from rpg-maker (and the game is not made in rpg-maker). And as always: -No Grind. -No Pixel Hunting. -No Stupid Penalties or artificial gameplay stretching. I hope you’ll enjoy it!
